items.question: What is Guide of Dubai?
items.answer: Guide of Dubai is a comprehensive travel guide designed to help you discover the best experiences in Dubai. You can find tours, activities, hotel reservations and more on a single platform.

items.question: Can I customize my tour?
items.answer: Yes! We can create custom tour packages for you. When you specify your interests, budget and preferences, we prepare the most suitable tour for you.

items.question: What's included in a Desert Safari?
items.answer: Our desert safari includes camel riding, sandboarding, traditional costume photos, BBQ dinner, belly dance show and two-way transfer services.

items.question: Are Burj Khalifa tickets included in the tour?
items.answer: Burj Khalifa tickets vary depending on the tour package. While included in some city tours, they can be added for an extra fee in others.

items.question: Can I make private tour reservations?
items.answer: Of course! We organize private group tours. You can have a completely personal experience with your own guide, vehicle and program.

items.question: Is the Museum of the Future included in your city tours?
items.answer: Museum of the Future is included in our premium city tour packages. It can be added for an extra fee in standard tours.

items.question: What are the safety measures for Desert Safari?
items.answer: All our vehicles are licensed, our drivers are experienced and safety equipment is fully equipped. We also carry out all our activities under insurance coverage.

items.question: How do I book a tour with Guide of Dubai?
items.answer: You can make online reservations from our website, contact us via our WhatsApp line or call our customer service. You can make payments securely with a credit card.

items.question: Is transportation included in tours?
items.answer: Hotel transfer is included in most of our tours. We provide free transfers from central areas such as Dubai Marina, JBR, Downtown Dubai.

items.question: How can I contact customer service for my questions?
items.answer: You can reach us via our 24/7 WhatsApp line (+971 xx xxx xxxx), email (info@guideofdubai.com) or phone. Live support on our website is also active.

items.question: How long does the Dubai City Tour last?
items.answer: Dubai City Tour lasts approximately 8-10 hours. It starts at 9:00 in the morning and ends between 18:00-19:00 in the evening.

items.question: Can I get a refund if I cancel my tour?
items.answer: You have the right to cancel free of charge up to 24 hours in advance. A 50% deduction is applied to cancellations after 24 hours. 100% refund is made for cancellations due to weather conditions.

items.question: Do I need a visa to visit Dubai?
items.answer: Turkish citizens can stay visa-free for up to 90 days. We have visa consultancy services for citizens of other countries.

items.question: Can I visit Miracle Garden year-round?
items.answer: Miracle Garden is only open during the winter months (November-April). It is closed during the summer months (May-October) due to maintenance.

subscription.title: Subscribe to Guide of Dubai to stay informed about discounts, campaigns and travel tips!
